transcript:
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan sir, sorry to disturb you sir. Actually na maine aapko isliye connect kiya hai dobara se, kyunki na abhi main isko campaign ko close karne ja rahi thi toh usme kuch hamare paas pointer aaya hai ki aapke paas ye 37 product aapne inko deactivate kar diye, inhein aap deal nahi karoge. But abhi hamari jo team hai na, catalog team uska kehna hai ki aap chaar se paanch product inhi mein se active kar dijiye, aap use toh vaise bhi nahi kar rahe ho. Kyunki kya hota hai fir aapki profile zero product pe download ho jayegi. Kyunki zero product pe hum profile ko rakhte nahi hai sir.
Executive: Achha madam isko kar dunga, kar dunga main na mere ko you don't disturb me, I will do it. Main abhi bahar mein hun. Main jab Bhubaneswar, Odisha aaunga Bhubaneswar mein tab main kar dunga isko.
Customer: Sir, abhi aapke main chaar se paanch product active kar doon isme?
summary:
Concerns:

- Request to activate four to five products out of the 37 deactivated products to avoid the profile being at zero products.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to activate the products upon returning to Bhubaneswar, Odisha.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. The executive will address the request upon returning to Bhubaneswar.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral to neutral



@@@Key Topics:

product activation, catalog, profile
